dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran
S. Ramos
T. Rehfeld
M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: A real-world urban scene dataset consisting of a training set with 2,975 images, a validation set with 500 images, and a testing set with 1,525 images.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: G. Ros
L. Sellart
J. Materzynska
D. Vazquez
A. M. Lopez
dcterms:description: A large collection of synthetic images for semantic segmentation of urban scenes, specifically the SYNTHIA-RAND-CITYSCAPES subset which shares 16 semantic classes with Cityscapes.
dcterms:title: SYNTHIA

dcterms:creator: S. R. Richter
V. Vineet
S. Roth
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: A dataset collected from a physically-based rendered video game Grand Theft Auto V (GTAV), containing urban scene images used for semantic segmentation.
dcterms:title: GTA5
